embeds.description:
Welcome to Aurealis | Chill ⋅ Hangout, a place for people to hangout and meet new people
Here you will find server rules and regulations
By residing in this server , you agree to abide by  [Discord's Terms of Service](https://discord.com/terms) & [Community Guidelines](https://discord.com/guidelines), as well as all of our rules.
On behalf of our staff team we hope you have a pleasant stay in the server!

fields.name: RULE #1: Be respectful with all members
fields.value:
```
Be respectful to others , No death threats, sexism, hate speech, racism (NO N WORD, this includes soft N)
No doxxing, swatting, witch hunting
```

fields.name: RULE #2:No Advertising
fields.value:
```
Includes DM Advertising. We do not allow advertising here of any kind.
```

fields.name: RULE #3: No NSFW content
fields.value:
```
Anything involving gore or sexual content is not allowed.
NSFW = Not Safe for Work
```

fields.name: RULES #4:No spamming in text or VC
fields.value:
```
Do not spam messages, soundboards, voice changers, or earrape in any channel.
```

fields.name: RULES #5:.Do not discuss about sensitive topics
fields.value:
```
This isn't a debating server, keep sensitive topics out of here so we don't have a ton of nasty arguments.
```

fields.name: RULE #6: No malicious content
fields.value:
```
No grabify links, viruses, crash videos, links to viruses, or token grabbers. These will result in an automated ban.
```

fields.name: RULE #7: No Self Bots
fields.value:
```
Includes all kinds of selfbots: Nitro snipers, selfbots like nighty, auto changing statuses
```

fields.name: RULE #8: Do not DM the staff team
fields.value:
```
do not DM the staff team regarding:
1)mutes
2)kicks
3)bans
or any other matter
```

fields.name: RULE #9:Profile Picture / Banner Rules
fields.value:
```
No NSFW allowed
No racism
No brightly flashing pictures to induce an epileptic attack
```

fields.name: RULE #10:Emoji Rules
fields.value:
```
No NSFW allowed
No racism
No brightly flashing pictures to induce an epileptic attack
```

fields.name: RULE #11:Use English only
fields.value:
```
We cannot easily moderate chats in different languages, our sincere apologies. English only.
```
